Html:
Hi guys, I'm working on a scope chart that graph data in real time, but my problem is that I need to

setup the intervals, max,min, and grid properties of the chart, does anybody know how can I do this??

 

thx

skabo

Hi Skabo,

use SetConverion(...), plotter.ViewPort.Visible to fix max and min limits.

Grid properties(you mean major grid lines, If I am right) are by default auto in any of the chart. If you want to control the grid properties, then you have to override the ticks.

Regards

Ravi.
